title: Im designing a baseball team logo and I want to find out if...
content:
Im designing "EC WORRIERS" logo. Since this is my first time designing a baseball team logo, I was hoping if you guys knew any good "baseball" fonts. The team wants a combination of a indian and a worrier..

thanks!
author: Ken W

comments.content:
You're a great worrier about baseball fonts, Ken, but I think the EC Worriers should worry more about their name, I think it's not exactly a good team name. ;-)

The [EC Warriors](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201091951/http:/www.ec-warriors.at/home.htm) in Austria play Ice Hockey, maybe their logo can offer some inspiration.

Andreas

<cite>"The team wants a combination of a indian and a worrier"</cite>

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201091951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/indian_worrier_5582.jpg)
  
Now if this guy was a font what would he be? ;-)  
(Sorry â€“ couldn't resist this one.)

ROFLBTC! Nina, you da man. Ein Bild sagt mehr als tausend Worte.

Andreas
